item.title: Lisa add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I think there's just one kind of folks. Folks." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Human beings are not born once and for all on the day their mothers give birth to them, but ... life obliges them over and over again to give birth to themselves." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra
item.description: "Muchos son los andantes," dijo Sancho. Muchos," respondió don Quijote, "pero pocos los que merecen nombre de caballeros." -- Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "Write what should not be forgotten." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "There is no death, daughter. People die only when we forget them,' my mother explained shortly before she left me. 'If you can remember me, I will be with you always." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "The library is inhabited by spirits that come out of the pages at night." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Lisa add a quote by William Shakespeare
Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling
